thread.title: Leaked Images of Pharrell & adidas’ New Sneaker Silhouette Have Hit the Web
thread.title_full: Leaked Images of Pharrell & adidas’ New Sneaker Silhouette Have Hit the Web

author: Chris Danforth
title: Leaked Images of Pharrell & adidas’ New Sneaker Silhouette Have Hit the Web
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
Key Features: Stan Smith-inspired colorway, Primeknit upper, all-new sole unit.
Release Date: N/A
Price: No info yet, but the Pharrell x adidas Originals NMD “Human Race” sneakers were priced at $240.
Editor’s Notes: Images of this new Pharrell x adidas makeup just hit the web, and we expect this to be a continuation of the Human Race footwear range. The shoe doesn’t appear to feature a Boost sole, but it’s difficult to confirm anything without better imagery and information. As with previous drops from Pharrell and adidas, the Human Race plays out heavily on the sole insert. Pharrell’s signature branding is also featured on the heel.
Head over to Highsnobiety’s curated shopping channel What Drops Now to shop our favorite releases.
